A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found it enjoyable and entertaining enough that it had my attention for the full (very long) length of the feature - a success in and of itself!  Sure\, it was convoluted and many questions were left hanging\, but it's part two of a trilogy\, after all... nothing I wasn't expecting\, and great fun from my perspective in any case.  I'll be seeing this one again!
